entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 17.
